<Link id="l00397" /><CodeLine lineNumber="397"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00398" /><CodeLine lineNumber="398"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Start with a nearest dominating clobbering access, it will be either</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00399" /><CodeLine lineNumber="399"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// live on entry (nothing to do, load is not clobbered), MemoryDef, or</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00400" /><CodeLine lineNumber="400"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// MemoryPhi if several MemoryDefs can define this memory state. In that</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00401" /><CodeLine lineNumber="401"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// case add all Defs to WorkList and continue going up and checking all</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00402" /><CodeLine lineNumber="402"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the definitions of this memory location until the root. When all the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00403" /><CodeLine lineNumber="403"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// defs are exhausted and came to the entry state we have no clobber.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00404" /><CodeLine lineNumber="404"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Along the scan ignore barriers and fences which are considered clobbers</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00405" /><CodeLine lineNumber="405"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// by the MemorySSA, but not really writing anything into the memory.</span></CodeLine>
